C

ColorPalette - Class in nice.palettes
Nice Color Palette A JSON of the top color palettes on ColourLovers.com for Processing Inspired by https://www.npmjs.com/package/nice-color-palettes
ColorPalette(PApplet) - Constructor for class nice.palettes.ColorPalette
a Constructor, usually called in the setup() method in your sketch to initialize and start the Library.
colors - Variable in class nice.palettes.ColorPalette
 

G

getPalette() - Method in class nice.palettes.ColorPalette
return an array with a random color palette
getPalette(int) - Method in class nice.palettes.ColorPalette
return an array with a color palette defined by the user and based on the size of the JSON.
getPaletteCount() - Method in class nice.palettes.ColorPalette
Return the number of palettes available

N

nice.palettes - package nice.palettes
 

R

refresh() - Method in class nice.palettes.ColorPalette
Download a new color palette's JSON by calling the colourlovers.com API.
refresh(int) - Method in class nice.palettes.ColorPalette
Download a new color palette's JSON by calling the colourlovers.com API.
